Package index

Initialisation and Shiny

Initialise echarts and use in Shiny.

e_charts() e_charts_() e_chart() e_data()
Initialise
echarts4rOutput() renderEcharts4r() echarts4rProxy() echarts4r_proxy()
Shiny bindings for echarts4r
